definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升为经销处副总经理，我心里特别高兴。

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根据预算方案，对冲基金经理将按更高的税率缴税。

sentences.english: Many data warehousing managers ask these questions today.
sentences.chinese: 今天又很多数据仓库项目经理都在问以上的问题。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一声，你见到我们的张经理吗？

sentences.english: We must appoint a new teacher soon.
sentences.chinese: 作为一位总经理，他应当任人为贤。

sentences.english: Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凯利柯克是一位作家，面包师，妈妈和人力资源经理。

sentences.english: I will talking with my manager about the bank transfer by Western tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明日我将会和我们经理讨论通过西联收款的问题。

sentences.english: The papers contained no requests for managers.
sentences.chinese: 报纸上没有登招聘经理的启事。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: That's what portfolio managers are supposed to be doing all the time.
sentences.chinese: 也是投资组合经理们一直应该在做的事。
请把这个通知用电子邮件发给各位经理。

sentences.english: To prevent avalanches , Park Rangers and Ski Slope managers do what?
sentences.chinese: 为了防止雪崩，公园看守者们和滑雪场经理们做什么？

sentences.english: He has filed his resignation with the manager.
Both line managers and employees have the responsibility to promote a half-year review.
sentences.chinese: 直线经理和员工都有责任推动年中审核。

sentences.english: He has had a copy of agreement between him and the manager made.
sentences.chinese: 他有一份和经理所签协议的副本。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
variant of 老闆|老板[lao3 ban3]
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
